amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike all of the missile-defense related portions of the bill with the exception of the Iron Dome program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to strike all of subtitle C of title II except section 237 (Iron Dome program).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 61 - 362 (Roll no. 230).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 61 - 362 (Roll no. 230).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Holt.
